title: Europe’s Impossible Choice: AI Development or Net Zero?

title: Trump's AI plan supports antitrust enforcement, DOJ official says
description: U.S. antitrust enforcers are on guard against anticompetitive behavior in the artificial intelligence sector as part of the Trump administration's plan to cement U.S. AI dominance, a Department of Justice official said in New York on Thursday.

title: Is Oracle really all-seeing on AI?
description: The Texas-based computer software company is on a roll but could be vulnerable when the artificial intelligence frenzy subsides

title: Trump, Starmer sign tech prosperity deal to spur AI, nuclear energy and quantum computing advances as part of $350B investment
description: President Trump and UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer on Thursday signed a joint memorandum of understanding authorizing $350 billion in investments on artificial intelligence (AI), civil nuclear energy and quantum computing.
content:
WASHINGTON — President Trump and UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer signed a joint memorandum of understanding Thursday authorizing investment of $350 billion in sectors including artificial intelligence (AI), civil nuclear energy and quantum computing.
